title: Cloister Cats
description: This little volume introduces readers to a collection of cats who've made their homes in England's ecclesiastical sites and communitiesâ€”from ancient ruins, like Fountains Abbey and Tintern, to active religious communities, like Prinknash Abbey and Iona. With captivating color photographs, quirky accounts of the cats' lives in and around the grounds, buildings, and gardens, and a "Quick Guide" to all the sites, this is just the book for cat lovers and visitors to England.
author: Richard Surman
